name: Experto CTA Widget – Call To Action, Sticky CTA, Floating Button Plugin
author: UX Design Experts

sections.description:
Maximizing Your Website’s Potential with Experto CTA Widget WordPress Plugin

#1 Plugin for Multi-CTA Pop Up Bubble Plugin on WordPress

Create a bubble popup for your website that enables your visitors to perform specific actions including form submission, conversing, appointment scheduling, newsletter subscription, inquiry posing, simplifying repetitive actions like invoice payments, and initiating chat.

Supercharge your website with Experto CTA Widget, designed by our team of UX experts to serve as a powerful Top-Of-The-Funnel (TOFU) tool, guiding your users towards targeted pages from the moment they land on your site.

Discover the ultimate solution for your website’s needs with Experto CTA Widget, the unrivaled choice among over 55,000 plugins available on WordPress.org. Say goodbye to Link Tree and hello to a customized solution designed specifically for your website, not just your social profiles.

An inside look:

With Experto CTA Widget, you can transform idle website visitors into loyal subscribers and customers, while delivering an unparalleled user experience to returning visitors who frequently perform repetitive actions on your site. Maximize your conversions and engagement with the #1 choice – Experto CTA Widget

Revolutionize your website’s user engagement with Experto CTA Widget – the dynamic and flexible WordPress plugin that empowers you to create and showcase multiple, compelling calls-to-action (CTAs) on your site. This plugin is your key to effortlessly integrating a variety of CTA types, including form fills, conversation starters, appointment scheduling, newsletter subscriptions, question inquiries, quick order options, repeatable actions like invoice payments, and instant chat.

With Experto CTA Widget, you can unlock the full potential of your website and captivate your audience, all while generating leads and increasing conversions. So why settle for basic CTAs when you can unleash the power of Experto CTA Widget? Get started now and take your website to new heights!

BENEFITS

  • Define your identity with one bubble popup on your website
  • Rapidly create and personalize your CTA Widget
  • Scrutinize your audience to captivate your website visitors.
  • Empower your CTA creation with Experto’s user-friendly interface
  • Customize your CTAs with ease using Experto’s Easy Customizable UI
  • Harmonize your brand with a Custom Color Scheme to match your website colors
  • Distinguish your CTAs with Custom Icons
  • Optimize your results with Experto’s Analytics feature.

Elevate your website’s engagement and drive more conversions with Experto CTA Widget Plugin, developed by the #1 Website Design company in Denver. Don’t wait, try it today and experience the difference!

  • Maximize your reach with Experto’s fully responsive and mobile-optimized plugin
  • Effortlessly collect leads with Experto’s direct email form integration
  • Boost your marketing efforts with Experto’s detailed analytics and A/B testing tools
  • Optimize your CTAs’ effectiveness to increase your website’s conversions

Sure, here are some additional use cases for the Experto CTA Widget Plugin by #1 Web Design company in Denver:

  • Boost e-commerce sales: Use Experto CTA Widget Plugin to add product-specific CTAs to your e-commerce product pages, such as “Add to Cart” buttons, “Buy Now” buttons, or “Sign up for updates” forms.
  • Grow social media following: Use Experto CTA Widget to add social media follow buttons or share buttons to your website’s pages and posts. You can also use social proof CTAs, such as “Join 10K+ followers”, to encourage visitors to follow your social media accounts.
  • Promote events or webinars: Use Experto CTA Widget to add event or webinar registration forms or buttons to your website’s pages and posts. You can also use pop-ups or sticky bars to promote your upcoming events or webinars and capture leads.
  • Schedule A Call: Experto CTA Widget plugin will help you to give Schedule A Call as an option to your customers for them to click and book a call with you.
  • Offer customer support: Use Experto CTA Widget Plugin to add live chat or support ticket CTAs to your website’s pages and posts.

There are 40+ different handymen services that can utilize #1 CTA Plugin to Maximizetheir Website’s Potential

There are 70 different types of businesses that can utilize #1 CTA Plugin to Maximizetheir Website’s Potential

sections.installation:
1. Upload the entire Experto CTA Widget folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory or search for “Experto CTA Widget Plugin” on WordPress.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. You will find ‘Experto CTA Widget’ menu in your WordPress admin panel.
  4. Once you are on the Experto CTA Widget admin panel, you can edit and change the text, fonts, colors and url of the CTA then click save.
  5. Choose development mode first so you can test and edit your CTA first. Development mode will only show to admins who are logged in. Live will show to everyone.
  6. Go to your home page and refresh. Once the page reloads, you will CTA on the right hand side.
  7. When you scroll down the CTA will collapse so that it does not take up too much room.
sections.faq:
What is a Experto CTA Widget plugin?

The Experto CTA Widget is a plugin that is both compact and lightweight. Its purpose is to allow you to create a floating bubble like chat bubble, which is an effective way to consolidate all of your important links into one convenient location.

How does the Experto CTA Widget plugin help increase website conversions?

With Experto CTA Widget, you can easily add a floating button to your website. This button can be customized to include links to your landing page, sales page, or any funnel you choose. Additionally, the widget also includes inbuilt contact forms, making it an ideal tool for lead generation.

How easy is it to customize the Experto CTA Widget plugin?

Our plugin allows you to customize every aspect of its appearance, including colors, text, and links. If you’d like to see how it all works, we invite you to check out our explanatory video.

Can the Experto CTA Widget plugin be used with any WordPress theme?

Yes, you can use this plugin with any theme.

Is the Experto CTA Widget plugin compatible with all types of devices?

Yes, this plugin is fully responsive for all type of devices.

How does the Experto CTA Widget plugin help with lead generation?

Experto CTA Widget Plugins lead generation capabilities have been enhanced by the addition of multiple forms that can be utilized in every CTA link. This means that you have the flexibility to assign either a form or a link to every CTA button, depending on your specific needs.

What types of analytics can I expect from the Experto CTA Widget plugin?

Experience the power of tracking with our tool that allows you to monitor the number of clicks per CTA.

Can I conduct A/B testing with the Experto CTA Widget plugin?

Yes, you can conduct A/B Testing by changing text on the CTAâ€™s and see which one is converting better and also you can reset the analytics if needed.

Does the Experto CTA Widget plugin support email form integration?

This plugin has inbuilt email forms but to answer No it does not integrate any 3rd party email integration.

Is it possible to have multiple CTAs on a single page using the Experto CTA Widget plugin?

Our tool actually only allows for one bubble per site, but within that, you can include multiple links and forms to optimize your lead generation strategy.

Can I use my own icons with the Experto CTA Widget plugin?

At the moment, it is not possible to add your own icons to the plugin. However, we have taken note of this feature request and it is something we may consider for future development of the plugin.

Is there a limit to the number of CTAs I can create with the plugin?

As of now, our plugin is limited to six CTAs within a single popup. However, we are continuously working on improving our product and plan to introduce different layouts in the near future.
How can I measure the effectiveness of my CTAs using the Experto CTA Widget plugin?

Does the Experto CTA Widget plugin slow down website performance?

Rest assured, our plugin is incredibly lightweight and will not negatively impact the loading speed of your website.

Can I schedule when my CTAs appear using the plugin?

We are sorry, but at the moment, our plugin does not have that particular functionality.

Does the Experto CTA Widget plugin support different languages?

We are dedicated to making our plugin available in as many languages as possible, but at this time, it is only available in English. Please know that we are actively working to expand the range of languages that our plugin supports.

Can I add animations to my CTAs with the plugin?

Our plugin is designed to be incredibly lightweight, and as such, we have intentionally left out any unnecessary libraries that might negatively impact the loading speed of your website.

Is the Experto CTA Widget plugin compatible with other WordPress plugins?

Rest assured, our plugin is designed to operate without conflict alongside any other plugins that you may have installed. In the unlikely event that you do encounter a conflict, we encourage you to reach out to us through our support forum or by emailing us directly at hello@uxdesignexperts.com.

Can I create different CTAs for different pages on my website using the plugin?

We must apologize for any confusion caused. Our plugin is designed to promote consistency throughout your site by utilizing a single CTA for all of your pages. This means that you can have only one CTA on every site, with the ability to include multiple links within that single CTA.

How does the Experto CTA Widget plugin help improve user engagement?

Visitors to your website will immediately notice the eye-catching button located on the bottom right or left-hand side of the screen. With just one click, they can quickly and easily get in touch with you using the customized forms and links that you have added to the CTA. This allows for streamlined communication, no matter what kind of query your users may have.
sections.changelog:
1.1.1 (March 14, 2023)

Improvement. Improved UI for icons, text and positioning form elements.
Improvement. New option added for enable/disable plugin.
Removed. Header form removed from front end.

1.0.1 (March 14, 2023)

Bug Fix. Fixed header icons issue in front-end cta.
Bug Fix. Fixed text overlaping in front-end.

1.0.0 (February 11, 2023)

  • First release.
  • Upgraded icon sets and speed optimization.

0.5.0

Bug Fix. Fixed text break in frontend
